title: Cobra The Animation: Time Drive (OVA)
alternative_title: COBRA THE ANIMATION タイム・ドライブ
description: In the current reality, Lady's existence is danger of disappearing. To save her Cobra must dive into her past, into a time when she still was of flesh and blood, and did not yet have a metal body. Not only will Cobra have to face the vicious foes from his past, he will also have to take care when encountering his former self...
